typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		StreamEnd as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FStoCuratedSource
FStoCuratedSource derive(SourceSystemID = "southridge",
		GlobalTransactionID = uuid(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDC
SourceDC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DimStreaming'],
	mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalTransactionID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimStreaming
